us.title: Why should you choose us?
us.text1: All purchases over $399 are eligible for free shipping via UPS Pack and Ship.
us.text2: All payments are processed instantly over a secure payment protocol.
us.text3: If an item arrived damaged or you've changed your mind, you can send it back for a full refund.
us.text4: Designed to last, each of our products has been crafted with the finest materials.
